amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part A of House Report 115-919 to encourage institutions of higher education to have students att end in-person loan counseling sessions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hartzler amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mrs. Hartzler.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hartzler amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
